text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Barcelonès | native_name = | native_name_lang = es | settlement_type = Comarca | image_skyline = | image_alt = | image_caption = | image_flag = Sin_bandera.svg | flag_alt = | image_shield = Sin_escudo.svg | shield_alt = | nickname = | motto = | image_map = Localització del Barcelonès.svg | map_alt = | map_caption = | coordinates = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | subdivision_type1 = Autonomous community | subdivision_name1 = | subdivision_type2 = Province | subdivision_name2 = Barcelona | seat_type = Capital | seat = Barcelona | parts_type = Municipalities | parts_style = list | p1 = Badalona, Barcelona, L'Hospitalet de Llobregat, Sant Adrià de Besòs, Santa Coloma de Gramenet | leader_party = | leader_title = | leader_name = | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 143.1 | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 3,000,000 | population_as_of = 2013 | population_density_km2 = auto | population_demonym = barceloní (m.) barcelonina (f.) | population_note = | blank_name_sec1 = Largest municipality | blank_info_sec1 = Barcelona | timezone1 = CET | utc_offset1 = +1 | timezone1_DST = CEST | utc_offset1_DST = +2 | postal_code_type = Postal code | postal_code = | area_code_type = Dialing code | area_code = | website = | footnotes = }} Barcelonès () is a comarca (county) of Catalonia, Spain. Its capital is Barcelona, which is also the capital of Catalonia. == Municipalities == Population figures are for 2009 (source: Spanish INE). District Population Area Density Barcelona 1,621,537 101.4 km² 15,991/km² L'Hospitalet 258,642 12.5 km² 20,691/km² Badalona 219,547 20,95 km² 10,479/km² Santa Coloma 119,717 6,57 km² 18,221/km² Sant Adrià 33,761 3.78 km² 8,931/km² Total 2,253,204 145.2 km² 15,517/km² ==Other websites== * Official web site (in Catalan) * IDESCAT: statistical information about Barcelonès (in Catalan) Category:Province of Barcelona
